content.question: Which of the following developments in colonial North America most helped to establish the “principle of consent” in government?

choices.label: The acquisition of Native American land by settlers
The growth of transatlantic economic connections
The autonomy of provincial legislatures from Great Britain
The use of indentured servants as an agricultural labor force

content.answer: The autonomy of provincial legislatures from Great Britain

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
